name: Star Wars: Triumvirate - Coruscant
description:
Star Wars: Triumvirate - Coruscant is a 2D action platformer about a Jedi Knight tasked with defeating a Sith Lord.

Use the Force and your lightsabers to defeat foes and your jump to traverse the shady Uscru District of Coruscant.

Controls

  • AD / Arrow Keys to Move
  • Space to Jump
  • Enter to Attack
  • Z to Block
  • Shift to Force Push
